pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: National Association of Broadcast Employees and Technicians, Local 11 Records, 1947-1984, bulk 1955-1984
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Local 11 represents NBC on a vertical basis and includes radio, television and satellite technicians, engineers, desk assistants, news writers, maintenance workers and all other employees. Records also cover ABC. (In Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives.)
